transcript.text: shabbat shalom this is daniel john lee
with tour restoration ministries it is
the 17th day of the 10p per month and
this is just a special Sabbath podcast
here to bless you it's called the
feeding of the 5,000 in the four
thousand by Daniel John Lee in Matthew
chapter 14 the feeding of the 5,000 has
accomplished through five loaves and two
fishes such an abundance is left over
twelve baskets collect the remainder in
Matthew 15 the feeding of the four
thousand is accomplished through seven
loaves and a few fishes such an
abundance is left over seven baskets
collect the remainder Matthew 14 equals
five thousand which equals five loaves
and five is the number for Mercy Mercy
is extended to the Gentiles for 2,000
years twelve baskets equals the twelve
tribes of Israel the Gentiles through
the mercy of Yahshua and his blood are
allowed to be grafted into the twelve
tribes of Israel / Ephesians chapter 2
hallelujah in Matthew 15 it's the 4000
which equals four and four is always
throughout scripture for always
represents it's the number for Israel
for the for the Israelites seven loaves
and seven baskets equals the shabbat or
the Sabbath day the israeli-born people
can only find the true Sabbath rest
through Jesus Christ of Nazareth Yahshua
the Messiah so it's really cool what we
have a picture up here in Matthew 14 we
have a picture of the Gentiles who need
to become grafted into Israel and thus
they need to keep the Torah and in
Matthew 15 we have the Jewish or Israeli
people and they of course need to accept
Yahshua is the Messiah to enter into
their Sabbath rest so both the
Christians need to keep Torah and the
Jews need to accept their Messiah
Yahshua and it's all embedded right here
in Matthew 14 in Matthew 15 through the
feeding of the 5,000 and of course
what's happened for the last 2,000 years
yah sure himself has given of his body
and his blood to feed those who want to
feed upon him whether you're Gentile you
can be grafted into the the Israel by
keeping the Torah walking in covenant
and serving Yahshua who is Yahweh or if
you're a Jew
born you can enter the Covenant by
accepting yahshua the messiah as the
true Messiah as prophesied the Tanakh
who is Yahweh manifest in the flesh so
Matthew 14 is a perfect picture of
Gentile believers you need to come into
Torah and Matthew 15 is a perfect
picture of the Jews you need to come
into Christ hallelujah so beautiful this
is daniel john lee with tour restoration
ministries website is wwwspa- accom
shabbat shalom
